feed.title: Cronicle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.57
entry.content:
• Fix PID file issue where another process may be assigned our old PID after an unclean shutdown.
  • Bump pixl-server to v1.0.44 for same reason.
  • Fixes #789

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.58
entry.content: • Fixed loading screen before a primary server is selected.

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.59
entry.content:
• Bump pixl-server-storage to v3.2.2 for upstream vuln fix.

Details in pixl-server-storage: - Bump @aws-sdk/client-s3 and @aws-sdk/lib-storage to 3.621.0 for vuln fix: GHSA-mpg4-rc92-vx8v - Bump @smithy/node-http-handler to 3.1.4 for good measure.

Refs: - https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-mpg4-rc92-vx8v - https://github.com/jhuckaby/pixl-server-storage/commit/f6a589a1b11372cbedb5c0a6ae1156fad0ec1465

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.60
entry.content:
• Bring back the live job status column, but show "Last Run" if no active jobs.
  • Merge pull request #812 from lihaohong6/master
  • Fix grammar in docs
  • Added note about timing object and subtle behavior differences.
  • Merge pull request #797 from Robokishan/master
  • initialize custom_live_log_socket_url

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.61
entry.content:
• Improve display of chain reaction jobs on Job Detail page.
  • Link chain reaction to originating job.
  • Widen event name input field.
  • Widen chain reaction menus for selecting jobs.
  • Merge pull request #819 from jhuckaby/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/multi-82ad408bf4
  • FIxes #821
